Object.Field:
STANDARD DEMAND FACTORY PACKAGE TO MANAGE PROMOTION ADD-ON.
STEPS:
- REFRESH VARIABLE CONTEXT CODE - REFRESH VARIABLE INSTALLATION PATH - REFRESH VARIABLE URL APP SERVER - MAPPING PROMOTIONS FROM ERP - INSERT PROMOTIONS FROM ERP - PROMO INIZIALIZATION - REFRESH VARIABLE NEW CYCLE - CHECK NEW CYCLE - DISAPPROVATION FOR OPEN PROMO - HISTORY REDEMPTION CALCULATION - HISTORY REDEMPTION APPROVATION - FORECAST REDEMPTION CALCULATION - FORECAST REDEMPTION APPROVATION
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PACCHETTO STANDARD FACTORY DEMAND PER IMPORTAZIONE E GESTIONE PROMOZIONI (ADD-ON). ATTIVARE UTILIZZO PACCHETTO NEL LOAD PLAN NEL CASO SIA COMPRESO NEL PROGETTO.
STEP:
- REFRESH VARIABILE CODCIE CONTESTO - REFRESH VARIABILE PERCORSO DI INSTALLAZIONE - REFRESH VARIABILE URL APPLICATION SERVER - MAPPING PROMOZIONI IN ARRIVO DA ERP - INSERT DELLE PROMOZIONI IN ARRIVO DA ERP - INIZIALIZZAZIONE DELLE PROMO NELLE TABELLE DI PRODOTTO - REFRESH VARIABILE NUOVO CICLO - CHECK NUOVO CICLO - DISAPPROVAZIONE DELLE PROMOZIONI ATTIVE - CALCOLO REDEMPTION STORICA - APPROVAZIONE REDEMPTION STORICA - CALCOLO REDEMPTION FORECAST - APPROVAZIONE REDEMPTION FORECAST -SCEN_STATUS=VALID

STANDARD DEMAND FACTORY VARIABLE FOR WEEKLY BUCKET PROJECTS. USED TO UNDERSTAND IF A NEW WEEKLY CYCLE NEEDS TO BE RUN. POSSIBLE USES:
- SALES ANALYSIS: UNDERSTAND IF THE LAST WEEK OF THE MATHEMATICAL HORIZON (STANDARD: +51) IS PRESENT IN THE SALES ANALYSIS OUTPUT TABLE. IF NOT, NEW SALES ANALYSIS BATCH NEEDS TO BE RUN - PROMOTIONS: UNDERSTAND IF SOME FORECAST PROMOTIONS ARE BECOMING HISTORICAL PROMOTIONS. IN THAT CASE, FOR THE NEW HISTORICAL BUCKET, IT IS NECESSARY TO RUN HISTORY REDEMPTION.

STANDARD DEMAND FACTORY VARIABLE TO STORE INSTALLATION PATH FOR THE SEDAPTA SUITE.
!!! EDIT THE STRING WITH THE INSTALLATION PATH THAT LEADS TO FOLDER "NICIM" !!!

DEFAULT DEMAND FACTORY VARIABLE TO STORE URL OF THE APPLICATION SERVER WHERE THE SEDAPTA SUITE HAS BEEN INSTALLED.
!!! EDIT THE EXAMPLE ServerName.domain.com WITH CUSTOMER SERVER PATH !!!

SELECT
CASE WHEN '<?=odiRef.getContext("CTX_CODE") ?>' = 'PROD' THEN 'D:\Sedapta\SupplyChain' WHEN '<?=odiRef.getContext("CTX_CODE") ?>' = 'TEST' THEN 'D:\Sedapta\SupplyChain' ELSE 'ERROR' END

SELECT
CASE WHEN '<?=odiRef.getContext("CTX_CODE") ?>' = 'PROD' THEN 'https://ServerName.domain.com' WHEN '<?=odiRef.getContext("CTX_CODE") ?>' = 'TEST' THEN 'https://ServerName.domain.com' ELSE 'ERROR' END
